name: SpEL:EVAL
description: Evaluate/apply the expression in Spring Expression Language on input and return the result.

controls.name: expression
controls.description: The Spring Expression Language (SpEL) expression to evaluate.

input.description: The input object serving as the root for evaluating the SpEL expression.

output.description: The value extracted by evaluating the specified SpEL expression on the input object.

examples.description: Evaluates the SpEL expression `user.firstName` on the input object to extract the user's first name.
